column4: Some MCU stories involve characters traveling to alternate timelines, dimensions or realities. If a clip is set solely in such a place than that clip will be indicated by these row colors so it can be easily differentiated. Otherwise, if a clip begins or ends with a scene set in an alternate timeline, dimension or reality it will be noted in bold in the comment.
Some scenes' chronological positions are vague with their only criteria being that they happen before or after a given scene(s).
Some scenes have a character talking over a flashback scene or there is dialogue (or music with lyrics) that begins or ends in a different scene.

Some scenes have aspects (e.g. dialogue) that cause their chronology to be in doubt, have content that retcon portions of other scenes, or the structure/editing of the work is too intrinsic, etc. See NOTE for details.

column15: Prologue: N'Jobu narrating the story of the first Black Panther and the formation of Wakanda to his son N'Jadaka (Erik).
NOTE: During this flashback sequence Hive is telling the story of his Inhuman transformation (Terrigenesis) in the present. The following clips leave out his narration.
Flashback: Up to Hive looking back and forth at the two Kree after he stumbles
Flashback: Hive panting looking up at one of the Kree up to an extreme close up of his face with his head bound by a braided metal cord
